name: Select Medical Holdings Corporation
description: Select Medical Holdings Corporation is a leading operator of specialty hospitals and outpatient rehabilitation clinics in the United States. Founded in 1997, the company focuses on providing high-quality care for patients recovering from serious illnesses and injuries, particularly in the fields of physical therapy and rehabilitation. Select Medical operates through two primary business segments: Critical Illness Recovery Hospitals and Outpatient Rehabilitation. The Critical Illness Recovery Hospitals provide intensive medical care and rehabilitation for patients who require extended recovery times due to severe illnesses, such as respiratory failure or stroke. Meanwhile, the Outpatient Rehabilitation segment offers a range of therapy services, including physical, occupational, and speech therapy, aimed at helping patients regain their independence and improve their quality of life. With a commitment to patient-centered care and a team of dedicated healthcare professionals, Select Medical strives to enhance the recovery experience through innovative treatment plans and advanced rehabilitation techniques. The company has grown significantly since its inception, expanding its footprint across multiple states and becoming a trusted name in the healthcare sector. Select Medical’s mission is to deliver exceptional care and support to its patients, ensuring they receive the best possible outcomes during their recovery journey.
